verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naadu pranamaa prabhunnuthinchumaa Naa antha ranga sakalamaa prabhunnutinchumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}raajula raaju nityamu prabhula prabhu nityamu Raajula raaju nityamu raaraaju prabhula prabhu Naadu praanamaa prabhunnutinchu Naa antharanga sakalamaa prabhunnutinchumaa{/lang-eng}
